            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Code = '';
                        
                        if( $this->ControllerWasAdded === false )
                        {
                              $Code = '{direct_controller:set_group=1;delete_group=1;toggle_group=1;'.
                                          'package_name=permit::permit_controller}';
                              
                              $this->ControllerWasAdded = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( $Code );

Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.

Definition at line 450 of file group_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 
                              'group' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE
                        );
                        
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'toggle_group_button' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              list( $Text , $Group , $MasterId ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'text,group,master_id' );
                              $MasterType = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'user' );
                              $CheckBoxes = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'checkboxes' , 'user' );
                              
                              $Code = $this->get_controller();
                              $Code .= "{href:text=$Text;page=javascript:ultimix.permit.DeleteGroupButton".
                                    "( '$Group' , $MasterId , '$MasterType' , '$CheckBoxes' )}";
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{delete_group_button:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 114 of file group_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        /* printing list of all available groups */
                        if( strpos( $ProcessingString , '{group_list}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                              $Items = $this->Database->select( 'title' , '`umx_group`' , '1' );
                              $c = count( $Items );
                              $AllGroups = '';
                              foreach( $Items as $k => $i )
                              {
                                    $AllGroups .= $i->title;
                                    if( $k + 1 != $c )
                                    {
                                          $AllGroups .= ', ';
                                    }
                              }
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{group_list}' , $AllGroups , $ProcessingString );
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

$  Str,
$  Changed

$Options - Processing options.

$Changed - Was the processing completed.

array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 174 of file group_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'object' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'group_list_for_object' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $GroupList = '';
                              
                              if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
                              {
                                    $this->Settings->load_settings( $Params );
                                    
                                    list( $Object , $Type ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'object,type' , 'public,' );
                                    
                                    $GroupList = $this->GroupAccess->get_groups_for_object( $Object , $Type );
                                    sort( $GroupList );
                                    $GroupList = implode( ', ' , $GroupList );
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{group_list_for_object:$Params}" , $GroupList , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_group_list_widget ( $  Options,
$  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'group_list_widget'.

Parameters:
$Options - Processing options.
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 236 of file group_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'object_groups' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'group_list_widget' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
                              {
                                    $this->Settings->load_settings( $Params );
                                    
                                    $AllGroupList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'all' , '' );
                                    if( strlen( $AllGroupList ) == 0 )
                                    {
                                          $AllGroupList = array();
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $AllGroupList = explode( ', ' , $AllGroupList );
                                    }
                                    
                                    $ObjectGroupList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object_groups' , 'public' );
                                    if( strlen( $ObjectGroupList ) == 0 )
                                    {
                                          $ObjectGroupList = array();
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $ObjectGroupList = explode( ', ' , $ObjectGroupList );
                                    }
                                    
                                    $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                                    $GroupListWidget = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'group_list.tpl' );
                                    $GroupListWidget = str_replace( 
                                          '{object}' , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object' ) , $GroupListWidget
                                    );
                                    
                                    sort( $ObjectGroupList );
                                    foreach( $ObjectGroupList as $key => $p )
                                    {
                                          $GroupListWidget = str_replace( 
                                                '{object_groups}' , 
                                                "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='$p"."_div_id'><input type=".
                                                      "'hidden' id='".$p."_field_id' name='groups[]' value='$p'><a ".
                                                      "href=\"javascript:DeleteGroup( '$p' );\">$p</a><br></div>{object_groups}" , 
                                                      $GroupListWidget
                                          );
                                    }
                                    
                                    sort( $AllGroupList );
                                    foreach( $AllGroupList as $key => $p )
                                    {
                                          if( in_array( $p , $ObjectGroupList ) === false )
                                          {
                                                $GroupListWidget = str_replace( 
                                                      '{rest_groups}' , 
                                                      "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='".$p.
                                                            "_div_id_rest'><a href=\"javascript:AddGroup( '$p' );\">$p</a><br>".
                                                            "</div>{rest_groups}" , 
                                                      $GroupListWidget 
                                                );
                                          }
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $GroupListWidget = '';
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{group_list_widget:$Params}" , $GroupListWidget , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 574 of file group_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'group_select' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              list( $Name , $Class ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'name,class',  'group,flat width_160' );
                                                            
                              $Code = "{select:name=$Name;class=$Class;".
                                          "query=SELECT id , title AS value FROM `umx_group` ORDER BY title}";
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{group_select:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
